companies.title: Student Intern (SPES Program) - Sports Committee
tasks: Assisted in organizing and coordinating local sports events and activities for the community.
Supported the Sports Committee in planning tournaments, scheduling events, and managing logistics.
Engaged with community members, promoting participation in sports programs and events.
Helped maintain records of participants, results, and event outcomes.

companies.title: Student Intern (SPES Program) - IT Support
tasks: Assisted with basic IT tasks like setting up equipment and troubleshooting simple issues.
Helped with organizing and digitizing documents for easier access.
Provided general support to the IT department as needed.
Gained experience in a professional setting while learning from senior staff.
